{{Wired embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=CM1100 |est_release_date=11/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=cable modem |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3390 |cpu1_cspeed=1.5 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |ram1=256 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |flags=DOCSIS 3.1, LACP, Link Aggregation, 802.3ad |default_ip=192.168.100.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui_eth=CC:40:D0 }} {{TagLine|Nighthawk Multi-Gig Speed Cable Modem}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/cable-modems-routers/CM1100.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=CM1100}} * 2 OFDM downstream & 2 OFDM upstream channels :for DOCSIS 3.1 connection * 32 downstream and 8 upstream channels :for DOCSIS 3.0 connection{{CableModemSpec |down_c=32 |up_c=8 }} ===Links=== *[https://www.cox.com/residential/support/netgear-cm1100.html ''Netgear CM1100 Cable Modem'' on '''Cox'''] * [https://kb.netgear.com/000060402/eASDZ6m1ALc2pZGYaaXYgGLy7eSFA6kC ''What is the difference between the Netgear CM1100
and CM1000 cable modems?'' on '''Netgear'''] :Multi-Gig Internet support via [https://kb.netgear.com/000060393/How-do-I-set-up-Ethernet-port-aggregation-between-my-NETGEAR-Nighthawk-CM1100-Multi-gig-Speed-Cable-Modem-and-NETGEAR-Nighthawk-AX8-router Ethernet Link Aggregation]. {{See also|Netgear CM1000|Netgear Jaguar (RAX80)}}
